title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions: Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in sleek black! Brew your favorite coffee in under a minute with three different size options (6, 8, or 10 ounces). The 36 oz removable water reservoir makes refilling a breeze, and the smart start feature ensures your coffee is ready when you are. The energy-efficient auto-off function saves you time and money, and the removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches. Plus, you can even dispense hot water for tea or other beverages. Compatible with K-Cup pods and Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter, this coffee maker is a must-have for any coffee lover. Don't miss out - get your Keurig K-Compact today!

Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in sleek black! Enjoy your favorite coffee at the touch of a button with brew sizes of 6, 8, or 10 ounces in under a minute. The 36 oz removable water reservoir allows for easy refills, while the smart start feature ensures a quick and efficient brewing process. With energy-efficient auto-off function and a removable drip tray that accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches, this compact coffee maker is perfect for any kitchen. Compatible with K-Cup pods and Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter, this coffee maker is a must-have for all coffee lovers. Get your hands on the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in black today! (Packaging may vary)
